title: US and France in foreign exchange market

content.description:
In answering the question, you should emphasize the line of reasoning that generated your results; it is not enough to list the results of your analysis. Include correctly labeled diagrams, if useful or required, in explaining your answers. A correctly labeled diagram must have all axes and curves clearly labeled and must show directional changes.

Assume that the United States and France are the only two countries in the world and that exchange rates between the two countries are flexible.

Assume that there is an increase in the United States demand for French goods. Explain how this increase in demand will affect each of the following.

The supply of dollars

The international value of the dollar

Assume that there is an increase in real interest rates in the United States, but not in France. Explain how this increase in interest rates will affect each of the following.

The international value of the dollar in the foreign exchange market

The quantity of dollars supplied in the foreign exchange market
content.question: Respond to all parts of the question.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
